attributes.additional_details:
In recognition of the act of valour commited all V.C. holders should recieve a military wage for life based on final pay point when discharged from service

This would be deducted for each one twentieth for each your under twenty years service and payable upon discharge only

Should the V.C. holder coplete additional years service in any of H.M Armed Forces or Reserves or Auxiliaries then this service should also be included proportionateley
